title: Sports Event Calendar
description: A full-featured sports event calendar with interactive month navigation, event detail views, and dynamic event creation. Features state management for real-time updates, filtering by sport and date range, and persistent storage using LocalStorage. Built with mobile-first responsive design with smooth CSS transitions and comprehensive unit testing using Vitest and React Testing Library.
technologies: React, Vite, JavaScript, CSS3, Vitest, React Testing Library

title: FitTracker Mobile
description: FitTracker Mobile is a fitness managing app that enables trainers to manage exercises, clients, and track fitness goals. Redesigned the frontend of the original FitTracker project to create a fully mobile-responsive experience with a cleaner, more modern UI and smoother styling. Removed authentication to make the app instantly accessible for demo/testing, while still using the same backend and database architecture as the original version.

title: FitTracker
description: Developed a full-stack fitness tracking web application that enables trainers to manage clients, assign workouts, and monitor progress securely. Built with Java, Spring Boot, JPA, and PostgreSQL for the backend and React.js for the frontend, featuring JWT-based authentication, token refresh, and protected routes. Deployed on Render and Netlify with responsive UI design, CRUD functionality, and environment-specific configurations to ensure a seamless, secure user experience.
technologies: Java, Spring Boot, JWT Spring Security, JavaScript, React.js, SQL.

title: GeoMyWish
description: 'GeoMyWish', allows users to create groups and manage shopping lists within those groups. Each group can have multiple shopping lists, and users can add, edit, and manage products within those lists, making it a collaborative tool for group-based shopping management.
technologies: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js

title: TinderBook
description: TinderBook is a server-side rendering application that allows users to connect with others based on shared interests, similar to Tinder but designed for book enthusiasts. Users can browse, like, and match with others based on their book preferences. Key Technologies: JavaScript, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, React, and JWT for user authentication.
technologies: JavaScript, Handlebars, CSS, Node.js, Express, MongoDB

title: Space Aircraft
description: Space-Aircraft is a web-based interactive game that allows players to control a spacecraft using simple arrow keys to avoid obstacles and navigate through space. The goal is to survive as long as possible while avoiding collisions with incoming objects. Key Technologies: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, and HTML Canvas
technologies: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, HTML Canvas, GitHub Pages
